bibl.title: P. Macquarie Inv. 360 (+ P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224): Acta Apostolorum 2.30-37, 2.46-3.2.
bibl.note: Provenance unknown, middle of the third century. The papyrus of Macquarie University is from the same codex leaf as a fragment in Milan [ed.: Claudio Gallazzi, P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224: Novum Testamentum, Act. 2,30-37 e 2,46-3,2, BASP 19 (1982) pp. 39-45, 2 pll.].
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Macquarie Inv. 360 + P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224
Pickering Stuart R., P. Macquarie Inv. 360 (+ P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224): Acta Apostolorum 2.30-37, 2.46-3.2.
ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 76-78 et pl. I b-c.

Provenance unknown, middle of the third century. The papyrus of Macquarie University is from the same codex leaf as a fragment in Milan [ed.: Claudio Gallazzi, P. Mil. Vogl. Inv. 1224: Novum Testamentum, Act. 2,30-37 e 2,46-3,2, BASP 19 (1982) pp. 39-45, 2 pll.].
